TABLE.NAME: topomojo
TABLE.COMMENT: each record is one topomojo resource

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: intro text format.

FIELD.NAME: workspaceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The is the gui

FIELD.NAME: timeopen
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz opens. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: timeclose
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz closes. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The total that the quiz is scaled out of.

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: The grading method for grading. This applies to grading multiple attempts

TABLE.NAME: topomojo_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: topomojo grades table to hold grades for individual users

FIELD.NAME: topomojoid
FIELD.COMMENT: the topomojo id

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid that this grade is for

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade for this user, for this topomojo lab

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time created/modified for this grade

TABLE.NAME: topomojo_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: The topomojo attempts table to hold attempts for students

FIELD.NAME: topomojoid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the topomojo lab for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: workspaceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The workspace guid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: eventid
FIELD.COMMENT: The gamespace guid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The current state of the attempts. 'inprogress', 'overdue', 'finished' or 'abandoned'.

FIELD.NAME: tasks
FIELD.COMMENT: The tasks for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: score
FIELD.COMMENT: The score for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The expirationDate of the event

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt began

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt ended

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt was modified

FIELD.NAME: launchpointurl
FIELD.COMMENT: The launchpointurl for this gamespace

TABLE.NAME: topomojo_tasks
TABLE.COMMENT: The table to hold steamfitter tasks

FIELD.NAME: topomojoid
FIELD.COMMENT: the topomojo id

FIELD.NAME: scenariotemplateid
FIELD.COMMENT: The steamfitter scenario template guid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: dispatchtaskid
FIELD.COMMENT: The steamfitter guid for this task

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The task name

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: The task description

FIELD.NAME: gradable
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the task is gradable

FIELD.NAME: visible
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the task is visible

FIELD.NAME: points
FIELD.COMMENT: The max points for this task

FIELD.NAME: multiple
FIELD.COMMENT: Process multiple vms as separate tasks

TABLE.NAME: topomojo_task_results
TABLE.COMMENT: The table to hold attempt task results for students

FIELD.NAME: taskid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the task

FIELD.NAME: dispatchtaskid
FIELD.COMMENT: The scenario task guid for this result

FIELD.NAME: attemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the topomojo attempt

FIELD.NAME: vmname
FIELD.COMMENT: The vm name for this result

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The steamfitter task status

FIELD.NAME: score
FIELD.COMMENT: Score given to the student

FIELD.NAME: comment
FIELD.COMMENT: A comment added by a teacher

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this result was modified
